    • Method Detail

      • print

        public int print(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 java.awt.print.PageFormat pf,
                 int page)
        The print method is orignally defined in the Printable interface and is defined here. This method begins to setup the print.
        Specified by:
        print in interface java.awt.print.Printable
        Parameters:
        g - This instance of the Graphics class is used to pass in the instance of Graphics that the print graphics are drawn on.
        pf - This instance of the PageFormat class is used to pass in the format of the page to be printed.
        page - This int is used to pass in th eindex of the page to printed
        Returns:
        This method returns an integer value based on whether there is a page to be printed.

      • setGraphics

        public void setGraphics(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This method sets up the graphics for the page that is being printed. It sets the graphics and draws text for the scores and names.
        Parameters:
        g - This is used to pass in the instance of Graphics that is used for the page.

      • printScores

        public void printScores()
        This method prints the page using a PrinterJob and its method print ().
